snippet: A reader responds to a recent article about Michael Bloomberg’s assertion that the Constitution does not protect protesters’ right to sleep in tents as a part of their protest.
lead_paragraph: A reader responds to a recent article about Michael Bloomberg’s assertion that the Constitution does not protect protesters’ right to sleep in tents as a part of their protest.

headline.main: A Right to Sleep in Tents
headline.print_headline: A Right to Sleep in Tents
